dict.acceptation: bear的过去分词；支撑，支持；亲自携带，运输；
出生的，出身于…的；天生的，天赋的；

sent.orig: Our method is based on the Born Approximation and re-weighted regularized conjugate gradient(RRCG) method.
sent.trans: 我们采用了Born近似方法和重加权正则化共轭梯度法(RRCG)算法。

sent.orig: Winter-born children are bigger and brighter than those born in summer.
sent.trans: 冬季出生的孩子比夏季出生的孩子体型更大，智商也更高。

sent.orig: Dragon born dragon, chellocken born chellocken, mouse son can make hole!
sent.trans: 龙生龙，凤生凤，耗子的儿子会打洞！

sent.orig: Are you more of a born follower or born leader?
sent.trans: 你是个的天生的追随者还是个人生的领导者？

sent.orig: You see, I was born to a teen-age mother who was born to a teen-age mother.
sent.trans: 要知道，我是由一个十几岁的母亲所生，而她的母亲生她时也只有十几岁。
